context: 7. Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net Net property, plant, and equipment consisted of the following: Depreciation expense was $510 million, $487 million, and $442 million in fiscal 2019, 2018, and 2017, respectively.
questions: What was the amount of depreciation expense in 2019?
In which years was the  Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net calculated for?
What were the components under Property, plant, and equipment, gross?
In which year was the amount of Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net larger?
